Cardiovascular Diseases/Heart Diseases/Myocardial Ischemia/Coronary Disease/Coronary Occlusion
Record.Description: Complete blockage of blood flow through one of the CORONARY ARTERIES, usually from CORONARY ATHEROSCLEROSIS.
